page.title: 04 HOUSING
page.content: The quality of{housing}in{Wickford} isn't spectacular,the houses have been made at speed when they were needed. The houses are mainly three or four bedroomed and semi-detached.The recent housing like The Wick have been made mainly for first time buyers,because they are two bedroomed.These are being made to satisfy the growing population .Houses have been knocked down in places and infilling has taken place. The houses in{Wickford}aren't extremely poor,but it could be better. My house is semi-detatched and made of bricks,it is about 17 years old and I have lived there for 15 years. My garden is about 20ft.long.The inside is made up of a kitchen,dining room,living room,hall and toilet. Upstairs there are 4 bedrooms and a bathroom.
